meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bryan Rucker Vincent Valenzuela Michelle Cabral Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7805.

div.div: The Final Jeopardy! screen displays the clue incorrectly in the studio, disadvantaging a challenger and resulting in him being invited back later in the year.

td.p: Bryan Rucker, a writer from Los Angeles, California
Vincent Valenzuela, an internal customer service manager from Wheaton, Illinois
Michelle Cabral, an elementary school music teacher from Toronto, Ontario, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,400)

tr.td: FIRST LINES FROM NOVELS
OUT IN LEFT FIELD
THE HUMAN BODY
CROSSWORD CLUES "P"
A STREETCAR
NAME DESIRED

tr.td: Michelle
Vincent
Bryan
MY AUTOBIOGRAPHY THAT I WROTE
SHADY CHARACTERS
IRISH HISTORY
THE SOCIAL NETWORK
(Alex: Then, from the official UNESCO list of 54 endangered World Heritage sites...)
WORLD HERITAGE IN DANGER
PARTING WORDS

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Michelle
Vincent
Bryan

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Preparing to reveal Vincent\'s response] Vincent reacted negatively a moment ago. Why was that? Because...)
(Vincent: I misread the question.)
[The clue displayed "his" instead of "this" in the studio, disadvantaging Vincent and resulting in his return in Season 35.]
BryanWhat is a tree hugger?
$0
MichelleWhat is a tree hugger?
$4,000
VincentWhat is tree hugger? Carl Sagan?
$13,201
a tree hugger')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'This slang term for an environmentalist is literally true of groups that used passive resistance vs. deforestation, as in India in 1973')

tr.td: MODERN LANGUAGE
This slang term for an environmentalist is literally true of groups that used passive resistance vs. deforestation, as in India in 1973
Michelle
Vincent
Bryan
2-day champion: $36,600
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Michelle
Vincent
Bryan

(including 1 DD),
1 W

(including 1 DD),

(including 1 DD),

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
